channel.title: Making server help plz
channel.description: i read the making a server thing and im lost. iv downloaded everything and did everything it said but it did not help me run the server at all so please help. it says can not read *.java ????[br][size=1]Posted at: October 23, 2006, 09:54:08 PM[/size][hr]no one wants to help a poor noob?

item.title: Making server help plz
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You need to set your classpath. Go into this area:
Start Menu -> Control Panel -> system -> Advanced tab -> Enviorment Variables button at the bottom

then find the variable called: path. Select it and click “edit”. Then rename it to PATH and make this its destination:

bin;F:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin

Then make a new variable called CLASSPATH and set its destination to this:

SET CLASSPATH=F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Then click “ok” and “ok” and then your compiler will work. I hope this helped. Enjoy!

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic

item.title: Making server help plz
item.dc:creator: @andrewdawg andrewdawg
item.description:
@andrewdawg wrote:

ok here right click compile and go to edit and paste over with this:

@echo off
COLOR 8a
title Noobscape Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe” server
pause
